about_the_game:
The amazing Posters and Propaganda Asset Pack from wonderful artist Melburnian is perfect for your Modern Day, Cyberpunk or Far Future games. The pack contains a wide selection of posters - ranging from advertising to political propaganda.

Lovingly created to reflect real adverts, the posters range from amusing to dark, and will fit perfectly with a wide range of games.

Each poster has been scaled to match a number of our other DLC's, so is cross compatible, but can be scaled quickly and easily within GameGuru MAX to suit any hoarding. Most of the designs are provided with a number of texture variations, so you can have clean, dirty and torn versions to suit your game style.

Lovingly created to reflect real adverts, the posters range from amusing to dark, and will fit perfectly with a wide range of games.

Each poster has been scaled to match a number of our other DLC's, so is cross compatible, but can be scaled quickly and easily within GameGuru MAX to suit any hoarding. Most of the designs are provided with a number of texture variations, so you can have clean, dirty and torn versions to suit your game style.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
